Class PeopleFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.example.cmput301_team_project.ui.BaseUserListFragment
com.example.cmput301_team_project.ui.PeopleFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class PeopleFragment extends BaseUserListFragment
A fragment that displays a list of people in the application. Extends BaseUserListFragment to manage user interactions.
